strengths: Crystal Fighters + Neuroglaive is a powerful combination
Initiative 0 (Foresight) — always acts first, scores first
weaknesses: Early aggression vulnerability before fighter screen established
Graviton Laser System counters your fighters
Space Dock II counterplay (opponents building more)
tips: Establish dual space docks in a double-planet system adjacent to home for fighter production
Post-Neuroglaive, even limited fighters block movement and enable extortion
Operate exclusively with fighters and carriers as your ship types
Emphasize influence acquisition (fighters are cheap); take Leadership whenever accessible
Maintain ready command tokens for Foresight ability
Establish an early lead and maintain it — your initiative 0 means you score first

techPaths.name: Green + Blue/Yellow
techPaths.note: Rush Crystal Fighter II (with blue skip) and Neuroglaive (with green skip)
